page.title: 10INDUSTRY/EMPLOYMENT-DIY
page.content: Great Mills is a DIY store.I am writing about the Great Mills on the Hedge End, Herald Industrial Estate.The employees there work from 9.00am until 8.00pm during weekdays and from 9.00am until 5.30pm at the weekend.Great Mills can tell if anyone is late because they have a clock-on clock-off system where a card is put in a special clock when you arrive which prints your time of arrival and when you leave it prints your time of departure.If you are late, 15 minutes of pay are deducted.A DIY shop is where you can buy tools and also cabinets, doors,kitchen units,garden equipment,paint,wallpaper,tiles and most things you need for home improvement.DIY means Do It Yourself and is popular because it saves people money.
